custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT SocialActivitySet.activitySetId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry INNER JOIN SocialActivitySet ON (SocialActivitySet.classNameId = AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classNameId) AND (SocialActivitySet.classPK = AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classPK) LEFT JOIN SocialRelation ON (SocialRelation.userId2 = SocialActivitySet.userId) WHERE ([$CLASS_NAME_IDS_CLASS_PKS])

SELECT DISTINCT AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classNameId as classNameId, AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classPK as classPK FROM AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry INNER JOIN SocialActivitySet ON (SocialActivitySet.classNameId = AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classNameId) AND (SocialActivitySet.classPK = AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classPK) LEFT JOIN SocialRelation ON (SocialRelation.userId2 = SocialActivitySet.userId) WHERE ([$CLASS_NAME_IDS_CLASS_PKS]) ORDER BY SocialActivitySet.modifiedDate DESC
